t: Amazon.com: Celestial - Triloka Premium Incense Sticks : Home & Kitchen
s: Since 1977, the Triloka brand has offered high quality hand-rolled natural incense. Triloka incense products are masala (mixtures of herbs, gums, resins, woods, oils), or masala-charcoal. Used traditionally for aromatherapy or purification purposes, each fragrance has a unique formula.
